name: myCred – myCred Githubreviews
author: myCRED

sections.description:
myCred Github is a plugin for WordPress that enables you to gain points based on approval of his/her pull request with the master branch of the project.

Features

  • It allows admin to get points once his/her pull request is accepted
  • Ease of connection between your site and the github by creating a github app and get you
    through github token, username, client ID and client secret.
  • Allow admin to view all repositories in his website and define which repositories that gain points
    will apply on it.
sections.changelog:

TWEAK – Code Optimization.

1.0.1

New – Compatible with WordPress Version 5.8.1.

1.0

Initial release

short_description: Empower your Website with myCred Github! Reward users with points for approved pull requests on designated repositories. Easy GitHub integration.

myCred Github is a plugin for WordPress that enables you to gain points based on approval of his/her pull request with the master branch of the project.

Features

  • Allow admin to view all repositories in his website and define which repositories that gain points
